"Gift of the Storm":
"Make Mr. Umblla happy!
Succeed by receiving one of his attacks!"
"Get hit by Mr. Umblla!"
"Mr. Umblla misses 3 attacks."
"Mr. Umblla missed with 5 attacks."

"/face2 It's Mr. Umblla. It seems he'll give
you a gift if you let him hit you."

"/face2 Mr. Umblla is happy. Did you
receive anything from him?
Now, continue your mission."

dangerous situation. All ARKS,
evacuate the area immediately."

"A weird energy signature is approaching!
Please be careful!"

"/face2 This is Mr. Umblla. It seems that

"/face2 Mr. Umblla is happy. Do you

"/face2 It's Umblla! It's Mr. Umblla!

"/face2 Mr. Umblla is so happy!
Were any of your prayers answered?
Please continue with the mission."

"/face6 Mr. Umblla has been angered...
Well, it can't be helped.
Please, hurry up and escape."

"/face3 Don't do that!

His mood has soured!"

"Are you okay?
One more, just hold out for one more!"

"Wow, what an incredible heat source!
P-please be careful!"

Please pay close attention to your surroundings."

"/face2 Mr. Umblla looks happy. Did

"/face6 Mr. Umblla is angry. This could
be dangerous. Please take

"/face2 Oh my, it's Mr. Umblla!
If you let him hit you, you might get something good!"

"/face2 Mr. Umblla looks happy!
I'm sure you'll get something good from him now!"

"/face6 Mr. Umblla seems angry!
There's nothing we can do about it now.
Get away from him as soon as possible."

"Please be careful!
